page.title: 13Local Churches
page.content: In the immediate area of Bellinge, Ecton Brook, Great and Little Billing there are many groups of churches represented. The oldest churches are the Anglican churches in Great Billing and Little Billing. The Roman Catholic church in Great Billing is not quite so old. In Little Billing the font is just over 1,000 years old. The Methodists have a church in Great Billing and other church groups meet in Bellinge Community Centre. Although "church going" is not so popular these days each church has its regular worshippers.
